articles.title: Taking morning-after pill with another drug is much more effective, study finds - The Guardian
articles.description: Giving women painkiller piroxicam alongside levonorgestrel found to prevent 95% of pregnancies

articles.title: Future emergence of new ecosystems caused by glacial retreat - Nature.com
articles.description: By 2100, the decline of all glaciers outside the Antarctic and Greenland ice sheets will produce new terrestrial, marine and freshwater ecosystems, posing both challenges and opportunities for conservation.
